title: Thomas Rhett tenderly places his hand on wife Lauren's bump at CMT Artist Of The Year Awards
text:
Thomas Rhett enjoyed a glamorous date night with his wife in Nashville on Wednesday.

While the country crooner, 29, put on a dapper display, Lauren Akins, 29, wore a chic black lace dress.

On display at the CMT Artist of the Year awards was his wife's growing baby bump.

Date night: Thomas Rhett and his wife Lauren Atkins hit the red carpet Wednesday night at the CMT awards, as Lauren showed off her baby bump

The Marry Me singer wore a brown suit with a dark shirt, partly unbuttoned at the top, underneath.

He paired it with a pair of brown shoes, slightly worn at the toe.

Known for his scruffy look, he stayed true to it, with a full beard and a curly hairdo.

Thomas and Lauren placed their hands on her stomach in photos, showing off her bump.

Her look: Thomas and Lauren placed their hands on her stomach in photos, showing off her bump. She looked chic in the black lace mini dress that she teamed with strappy black stilettos

His look: The Marry Me singer wore a maroon suit with a dark shirt, partly unbuttoned at the top, underneath

She looked chic in the black lace mini dress that she teamed with strappy black stilettos

Her dress had sheer sleeves and chest, with black polka dot designs and lace details.

They announced they are expecting their third child, a girl, back in July.

The new baby will join Willa Grey, three, who they adopted from Uganda in 2017, and Ada James, two, who they welcomed later that year.

More family: The new baby will join Willa Grey, three, who they adopted from Uganda in 2017, and Ada James, two, who they welcomed later that year

Happy Anniversary: Country music star Thomas Rhett celebrated his seven year wedding anniversary with wife Lauren Akins on Saturday

The couple recently celebrated their seventh wedding anniversary earlier this month. They married in 2012 after being friends since second grade.

'I can’t believe the Lord has blessed me with 7 amazing years of marriage with @lauren_akins,' Rhett began, in the caption of an Instagram photo where they're both fly fishing.

Akins added her own sentiments in an Instagram post of her own, along with a photo from their joyous wedding.

'Happy wedding anniversary 7 years ago tonight honey,' Akins began, adding a gold heart emoji.

'You are better than my best dream and so is our life with our precious babies,' she added, referring to their daughters Willa Grey and Ada James.

'I’m so thankful God gave me you:) can’t wait for the next 70 babe y+m I love you Thomas Rhett,' she concluded.
description: Thomas Rhett got a date night with his wife  on Wednesday night. While the country crooner put on a dapper display, Lauren Akins wore a chic black lace dress.
